name: Romanoff & Partners
goal: ROMANOFF & PARTNERS is a Brussels based corporate representation and consultancy in political advocacy, public affairs and networking. Specifically focusing on the interest of companies and sectors within Russian and Eastern European countries and their specific needs within the European Union.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
EU energy and EU Transport
Health - Physical Activity and Cancer
